summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Irving Street, Day Street, and Atlantic Street, each from Thirty-first Avenue South to Thirty-second Avenue South; and Thirty-second Avenue South, from Irving Street to Massachusetts Street; Thirty-first Avenue South, from Day Street to Judkins Street, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon, also by constructing curbs and gutters, in accordance with Resolution No. 732 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
